column4: Designed for exceptional ease of use. Personal noise measurement that doesn’t weigh you down — compact, 3-ounce unit comfortably clips to the shoulder.
column5:
Intuitive display with lockout ability

Large, easy-to-read display provides crucial information at a glance, or can be set to inhibit display, to ensure settings and measurements can’t be tampered with.

LED dose indicator

LED indicator can be programmed to flash when dose level has been exceeded, helping safety managers easily identify employees who have reached their daily maximum noise dose exposure.

Contoured for comfort

Ergonomically designed shoulder mount provides comfort and ease of movement, even when workers are equipped with multiple monitors.

column4: Designed for exceptional ease of use. Personal noise measurement that doesn’t weigh you down — compact, 3-ounce unit comfortably clips to the shoulder.
column5:
Intuitive display with lockout ability

Large, easy-to-read display provides crucial information at a glance, or can be set to inhibit display, to ensure settings and measurements can’t be tampered with.

Intrinsic safety approvals

The Edge eg5 carries intrinsic safety approvals from MSHA, SIRA (ATEX), CSA (US and Canada) and Simtars (IECEx). Monitoring can be safely performed in potentially hazardous environments where devices must be certified.

Three independent dosimeters

The Edge eg5 enables simultaneous measurement against as many as three industry standards, saving time and cost by reducing the need for multiple instruments.

column4: Tough enough for the job. Built with a sturdy IP-65 aluminum case for rugged and reliable noise measurement.
column5:
Efficient

Only one instrument needed to measure two independent dosimeter readings — LCD display offers quick assessment at a glance.

Versatile

Optional boom microphone allows conversion to sound level meter for area sampling.

Reliable

Meets UL, cUL, MSHA, Ex and ATEX intrinsic safety standards.

column4: Tough enough for the job. Built with a sturdy IP-65 aluminum case for rugged and reliable noise measurement.
column5:
Efficient

Only one instrument needed to measure two independent dosimeter readings — LCD display offers quick assessment at a glance.

Reliable

Meets UL, cUL, MSHA, Ex and ATEX intrinsic safety standards.

Flexible

Data logging stores time history with average and maximum readings (LAVG/LEQ, SlowMax, FastMax), so data collected can be downloaded into 3M Detection Management Software DMS for further analysis and compliance reporting.

column4: Tough enough for the job. Built with a sturdy IP-65 aluminum case for rugged and reliable noise measurement.
column5:
Efficient

Four dosimeters in one — only one instrument needed to measure up to four independent dosimeter readings.

Reliable

Meets UL, cUL, MSHA, Ex and ATEX intrinsic safety standards.

Flexible

Data logging stores time history with average and maximum readings (LAVG/LEQ, SlowMax, FastMax), so data collected can be downloaded into 3M Detection Management Software DMS for further analysis and compliance reporting.

User friendly

Simple four-button navigation to perform all functions and comes ready to take measurements; no configuration necessary.

Smart

Integrating feature computes the average soundpressure level (LEQ/LAVG), for easier interpretation.

Industry compliant

Consistent performance with accurate readings and meets applicable ANSI and IEC Class 2 standards.

column4: Consistent noise level measurement for highly variable environments.
column5:
User friendly

Intuitive interface allows for out-of-box use with little to no training. Data logging stores time history with average and maximum readings (LAVG/LEQ, SlowMax, FastMax), so data collected can be downloaded into 3M Detection Management Software DMS for further analysis and compliance reporting.

Versatile

Printing capability with optional digital printer provides hard copy documentation in the field.

Accurate

Meets IEC61672-1 (2002) and ANSI S1.43-1997 (R2007) standards, so you can be confident that data collected is accurate.

Accurately measures against multiple sound level standards simultaneously with two virtual meters — documents and displays noise exposure to support hearing conservation.

column2: 3M™ Reverberation Option for SoundPro™ Sound Level Meter
column5:
User friendly

Easy set-up and operation.

Accurate

Measurement results are viewable in 1/1 or 1/3 octave band charts.

Flexible

Digital readout displays T60 results in a tabular view, decay chart view and a bar chart view.

User friendly

Easy set-up and operation with results in Speech Transmission Index-PA (STI-PA) and Common Intelligibility Scale (CIS) formats.

Fast and accurate

Quick 15-second measurement intervals with post-processing from meter.

Flexible

Sample and store ambient noise during peak business hours to perform non-disruptive after-hours studies.

User friendly

Easy set-up and operation with results in Speech Transmission Index-PA (STI-PA) and Common Intelligibility Scale (CIS) formats.

Fast and accurate

Flexible
